title: Today’s ‘Heardle’ Answer And Clues For Sunday, December 11
description: Here's today's 'Heardle' song, along with some hints.

title: To Stop Killer Drones, Ukraine Upgrades Ancient Flak Guns With Consumer Cameras And Tablets
description: Photos of an air defense training exercise of Ukraine’s Territorial Defense Force show a 20-millimeter anti-aircraft gun fitted with consumer CCTV cameras to serve as thermal and daylight sights. These send their video output to a tablet mounted on a $30 flexible stand by Dallas-based North Bayou.

title: New Apple Leak Reveals iPhone 15 Price Shock
description: Apple's iPhone 15 Ultra looks set to drive a massive price rise across all iPhone 15 models...

title: Human Population And A Technology Innovation To Blow Your Mind
description: The human population is slowing down. Are board directors and CEO's planning ahead to curb the pending labor shortage? Will humans face extinction risks as Elon Musk has predicted without major technology advances? Meet EctoLab.

title: Panama Fossils Help Unlock Mystery Of How Frogs Got Their Form
description: Colombian researcher María Camila Vallejo-Pareja is using fossil frogs from millions of years ago in order to understand the shape and distribution of the vast diversity of frogs found in Central America today.

title: Business Leaders Are Still Nervous About the Side Effects Of Artificial Intelligence
description: Real money — and lots of it — is on the line, and, ultimately, there is fear that AI may be more fad than substance.

title: E-commerce Bots Boosting Prices, Causing Shortages, And Taking Advantage Of Crises
description: When TicketMaster melted down in November under the avalanche of Taylor Swift fans trying to get concert tickets, the company blamed bots. The implication: 90% of TicketMaster’s site traffic was artificial.

title: Google Improves Privacy Of Google Photos But Makes Key Feature Worse
description: Google has made an important change that will affect the accuracy of location information.

title: In Photos: NASA’s Orion Spacecraft Returns After Epic Mission Beyond The Moon
description: The Artemis-I mission has ended successfully as the Orion spacecraft splashed down in the Pacific Ocean after 25.5 days in space and a 1.4-million-mile journey around the Moon.

title: Where A White Christmas Is Most Likely, And Not, In 2022
description: A big winter storm is moving across the United States this week, bringing heavy snow to a number of locales, but many eyes are on the extended forecast, in particular towards a few dates two weeks from now.

title: Elon Musk Tweets ‘My Pronouns Are Prosecute/Fauci,’ Here’s The Response
description: A number of real scientists and public health experts essentially responded what/what/what to Musk's pronouns tweet about Fauci.

title: A Psychologist Teaches Us How To Rise Above The Holiday Family Drama
description: Unhealthy family dynamics can drag down your holiday spirits. Here’s what you can do to buoy your mood.

title: Fortnite’s ‘My Hero Academia’ Skin Crossover Gets A Release Date
description: Here's the release date for Fortnite's My Hero Academia skins, coming soon.

title: Entrepreneurs And SMB Owners, Focus On What Your Business Does Best, Outsource The Rest
description: Not too long ago, as you were building your company or growing your small business, you added more people to fit specific functions. Perhaps not anymore.

title: A Wild Idea: Could Xbox Release ‘Starfield’ On PlayStation To Appease Regulators?
description: Alright look, this idea may sound insane, but this entire situation is proving to be increasingly insane the longer things go on, so I’m not going to rule out anything when it comes to Microsoft attempting to secure this Activision Blizzard deal in the wake of Sony-fueled regulator pushback.

title: Netflix’s Cancels Yet Another YA Series Early, Part Of A Long-Running Pattern
description: Another day, another Netflix cancelation, and this one was easy to see coming a long ways off.

title: ‘Demon Slayer Season 3: Swordsmith Village Arc’ Gets A Release Date At Last
description: Here's the release date for Demon Slayer season 3, The Swordsmith Village Arc.

title: Destiny 2’s API Being Down Shows Just How Reliant It Is On Third Parties Like DIM
description: This Friday, Destiny 2 players were hit by a enormous series of errors that ruined their runs of the new dungeon.

title: These Rosewood Oriole Headphones From SIVGA Could Be The Best You’ve Ever Heard
description: These sensibly priced Oriole rosewood headphones from SIVGA offer incredible sound and amazing value for money.

title: Why Women Aren’t Getting VC Funding At The Same Rate As Men
description: Those same investors asked men how they will acquire customers, and asked women how they will retain customers.

title: Today’s Wordle #540 Hints, Clues And Answer For Sunday, December 11th
description: That’s the sound of Christmas closing in Jingle Bells and reindeer hooves mucking up your shingles.

title: #BringBackMasks Trends As ‘Tripledemic’ Of Covid-19, RSV, Flu Worsens
description: Covid-19 transmission levels are now high throughout much of the country, prompting recommendations to wear face masks again.

title: The Secret Lives Of Greenland Sharks
description: Despite the harsh weather and the ice cover, the Arctic Ocean is teeming with life. Scientists decided to dive deep into the seasonal residency, activity space, and use of deep-water channels by Greenland sharks (Somniosus microcephalus) in an Arctic fjord system.

title: Today’s ‘Quordle’ Answers And Clues For Sunday, December 11
description: Some hints and the solution for today's 'Quordle' are just ahead.

title: Webb Telescope Finds Earliest Galaxies Yet Close To The Big Dipper
description: The new space observatory has confirmed four early galaxies dating back to less than 400 million years after the Big Bang, three of which are the most distant confirmed to date.
